pkgmetadata.longdescription: # toolkit4lifeA PyPI package to help speed-up development and make life easier.## Features- **logger**: Different decorators to use on your fuctions- **threads**: *Thread* and *ThreadPool* with return values- **requests**: Send requests with Backoff-Strategy- **clients**: - **redis**: Redis-Client - **trino**: trino-Client - **postgre**: PostgreSQL-Client
